LanguageData.TM_SoothingBalmHD.label: soothing balm
LanguageData.TM_SoothingBalmHD.description: A topical balm used to stop bleeding, heal wounds, and reduce pain. Soothing balm acts as a mild anesthetic and reduces the awareness of the patient.
LanguageData.TM_HerbalClarityHD.label: Clarity
LanguageData.TM_HerbalClarityHD.description: A potion that helps the consumer open themselves to the arcane. Mana regeneration is increased up to 300% and psychic sensitivity is increased up to 50%. Effects also decrease mental stability. The effects of this drug last several days but lose potency over time.

LanguageData.TM_HerbalBlissHD.label: Bliss
LanguageData.TM_HerbalBlissHD.description: Puts the user in a state of bliss, able to almost completely mask emotions and pain. This drug will cause the consumer to slowly lose skills, and skill gain while under the influence of this drug is heavily suppressed.

LanguageData.TM_MuteHD.label: Magically Mute
LanguageData.TM_MuteHD.description: A curse that prevents the use of magical abilities.
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactMendingHD.label: Mending
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactMendingHD.description: Mends and repairs equipped apparel and weapons.
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactHealthHD.label: Improved Health
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactCatEyesHD.label: Dark Sight
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactCatEyesHD.description: Improves sight and grants minor night vision.
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactStrengthHD.label: Strength of Stone
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactMindHD.label: Mind Ward
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactMindHD.description: A unique talisman that helps a pawn compartmentalize their emotions to quickly recover from a mental breakdown.
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactRenewalHD.label: Renewal
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactArcaneRecoveryHD.label: Arcane Recovery
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactArcaneRecoveryHD.description: Increases the recovery rate from Arcane Weakness; does not reduce the amount of Arcane Weakness acquired.
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactPathfindingHD.label: Pathfinding
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactPathfindingHD.description: A talisman that uncannily ascertains an easy path across any obstacle; bypasses the movement penalty for obstacles and terrain.
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactBlockHD.label: Blocking
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactBlockHD.description: Blocks physical attacks; prevents damage from successfully blocked attacks.
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactDeflectHD.label: Deflective Blocking
LanguageData.TM_ArtifactDeflectHD.description: Blocks attacks and can deflect projectiles to nearby enemies; prevents damage from a successfully deflected attack.
LanguageData.TM_Artifact_BloodBoostHD.label: Blood Boost
LanguageData.TM_Artifact_BloodBoostHD.description: Increases the maximum blood magic available to a blood mage.
LanguageData.TM_Artifact_PsionicBoostHD.label: Psionic Boost
LanguageData.TM_Artifact_PsionicBoostHD.description: Increases the maximum psionic energy available to a psionic.
LanguageData.TM_Artifact_HateBoostHD.label: Hate Boost
LanguageData.TM_Artifact_HateBoostHD.description: Increases the maximum hate available to a death knight.
LanguageData.TM_TraitInfusionHD.label: Trait Infusion
LanguageData.TM_TraitInfusionHD.description: A pawn has gained traits through magical infusion; this will affect their sense of self.
LanguageData.TM_WinterStaffHD.label: Winter's Chill
LanguageData.TM_WinterStaffHD.description: Drains heat and energy from the body; prevents heat stroke. Mages only: lowers room temperature.
LanguageData.TM_ShroudOfUndeathHD.label: Shroud of Undeath
LanguageData.TM_ShroudOfUndeathHD.description: Reduces undead upkeep of this necromancer and increases the movement and attack power of nearby undead.
LanguageData.TM_LullabyHD.label: Lullaby
LanguageData.TM_LullabyHD.description: Reduces the consciousness of a pawn.
LanguageData.TM_LullabyHD.stages.0.label: I

LanguageData.TM_BloodHD.description: Accounts for the blood power of a blood mage.
LanguageData.TM_RendHD.label: Hemorrhaging
LanguageData.TM_RendHD.description: A horrendous wound causing massive bleeding.
LanguageData.TM_BloodForBloodHD.label: Blood Drain
LanguageData.TM_BloodForBloodHD.description: Transfers blood from this target to a blood mage. Heals wounds in the process.
LanguageData.TM_BloodShieldHD.label: Blood Shield
LanguageData.TM_BloodShieldHD.description: Enveloped in a protective bubble of life energy; energy from each blow to the Blood Shield restores health to the protected pawn.
LanguageData.TM_LightCapacitanceHD.label: Light power
LanguageData.TM_LightCapacitanceHD.description: The amount of stored light power available to a mage - acts as a catalyst for light magic.
LanguageData.TM_LightBurstHD.label: Blinding Flash
LanguageData.TM_LightBurstHD.description: Pain, blindness and disorientation as a result of intense light effecting sensory organs. Disoriented pawns are unable to distinguish enemies from allies.
LanguageData.TM_LightBurstHD.stages.0.label: dim vision
LanguageData.TM_LightBurstHD.stages.1.label: blinded
LanguageData.TM_LightBurstHD.stages.2.label: disoriented
LanguageData.TM_ChaosTraditionHD.label: Chaotic Flux
LanguageData.TM_ChaosTraditionHD.description: Exercising control of reality through objective interpretation that results in the emphasis of the physical and mental solidity of a Chaos Mage.
LanguageData.TM_ChaosTraditionHD.stages.0.label: I
LanguageData.TM_ChaosTraditionHD.stages.1.label: II
LanguageData.TM_ChaosTraditionHD.stages.2.label: III

LanguageData.TM_ChaoticMindHD.stages.0.label: thought
LanguageData.TM_ControlledChaosHD.label: Controlled Chaos
LanguageData.TM_ControlledChaosHD.description: Exercising control of reality through objective interpretation that results in the emphasis of the physical and mental solidity of a Chaos Mage.
LanguageData.TM_ControlledChaosHD.stages.0.label: CHAOS
LanguageData.TM_AccelerateTimeHD.label: Aging
LanguageData.TM_AccelerateTimeHD.description: Rapidly ages a pawn. Any other conditions affecting the pawn will also accelerate their natural tendencies. Pawns aged beyond their typical lifespan are frequently beset by age related illnesses or conditions.
LanguageData.TM_AccelerateTimeHD.stages.0.label: I
LanguageData.TM_AccelerateTimeHD.stages.1.label: II
LanguageData.TM_AccelerateTimeHD.stages.2.label: III
LanguageData.TM_AccelerateTimeHD.stages.3.label: IV
LanguageData.TM_ReverseTimeBadHD.label: Reverse Aging
LanguageData.TM_ReverseTimeBadHD.description: Rapidly reverses the age of a pawn. Any other conditions affecting the pawn will also reverse their natural tendencies. Conditions reversed beyond the point in time that they were acquired will cease to exist. Pawns reversed before the point int time that they were spawned will also cease to exist.

LanguageData.TM_PredictionHD.label: Prediction
LanguageData.TM_PredictionHD.description:
Allows the prediction of future events or actions.
Admin note: this ability predicts and delays any event. Some mods use these types of events as triggers for effects or outcomes, this can cause errors if the situation changes and certain objects, items, or conditions are no longer valid when a predicted event occurs.

LanguageData.TM_ArcaneWeakness.label: arcane weakness
LanguageData.TM_ArcaneWeakness.description: Arcane Weakness is a byproduct of casting magical abilities. Minor abilities with a mana cost less than 25 will not incur Arcane Weakness. The amount of Arcane Weakness that will affect a mage is relative to the mana cost of the ability.

LanguageData.TM_CursedHD.label: arcane curse
LanguageData.TM_CursedHD.description: Arcane curse is a byproduct of the cursed trait. The cursed pawn is constantly affected by arcane weakness that will gradually increase until it is a persistent illness. The effects of the curse can be offset by using magic, however, the pain caused by the curse does provide a unique clarity. The curse can be lifted by removing the pawn's magical trait.
LanguageData.TM_CursedHD.stages.0.label: faded
LanguageData.TM_CursedHD.stages.1.label: moderate
LanguageData.TM_CursedHD.stages.2.label: heightened

LanguageData.TM_ManaSickness.label: mana sickness
LanguageData.TM_ManaSickness.description: Mana sickness affects mages when they have 0 mana and their regeneration is negative. Mana sickness will eventually kill a mage if it is not reversed. Players may evaluate a mage's mana regeneration in the Magic Tab while hovering over the Mana regeneration value to display a tooltip showing contributors affecting mana regeneration.
